title: The Laptop Your Boss Will LOVE - Panasonic Toughbook G2
description: Get 20% OFF + Free Shipping @Manscaped at    The Panasonic Toughbook G2 is a laptop/tablet combo that can take a bit of abuse as it can be dropped and handle water spills. However, it's also modular and configurable, so you can make it to whatever you want and probably be really easy to repair instead of being replaced! Your boss is going to love these.
